contentList.content: Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag> fuels you with <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag> fuels you. At the beginning of each turn while <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag> is active, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> + your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
